text: War for the Planet of the Apes is a 2017 American science fiction action movie directed by Matt Reeves and written by Mark Bomback and Reeves. It is a sequel to Rise of the Planet of the Apes (2011) and Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014). The movie stars Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson, and Steve Zahn. A sequel, Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes, was released in May 2024. It was the final Planet of the Apes movie released under 20th Century Fox before Disney's acquisition of the studio. ==References== Category:2017 science fiction movies Category:2017 action movies Category:American action movies Category:Planet of the Apes movies Category:American sequel movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Matt Reeves Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies about apes Category:Movies about viral outbreaks Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Alberta Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies set in the 21st century Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino Category:American science fiction movies
title: War for the Planet of the Apes
